item.title: I haven't been active here for too long
item.description: Not sure if I’ll start writing more or not, but I want to have a blog and revive this. Maybe soon. Let’s see how this post looks first, I also need to learn how do I add images here Probably not too difficult

item.title: My new home
item.description: I’m just testing out how to work with this new blog format that is fully customizable, finally something I can call my own and be happy with, after a while of having some free hosted blogs that I wasn’t happy with.
